values: hey fuckers, my birthday is sunday.

i'm tired.

work last night
work tonight
craziness.

yesterday was good, i was really exhausted. but yeah . candace .me .erry. love. starbucks. being losers and talking about grandparents/relatives. 

need to go chekc out SAT grade. i probably got slaughtered cause i'm a fool

lately i've been wondering where my whole year went. i didn't seem to absorb any academic information, and now it's really killing me.

i hate writing entries about school cause everyone always is complaining about it, why complain more? everyone knows it's stressful.. well, yeah i don't know. i'm just getting really frusturated with everything.

this is really the first time i've studied for the apush exam, and yeah, i feel like i havn't registered any information this year, and i don't exactly know why. perhaps i just wasn't used to how recker teaches (or doesn't teach), blech. i'm going to do terribley on this AP, and for some reason i'm really nervous about it.. i mean, it doesn't matter what i get, but i'd feel like all the work i put into the course would be meaningless if i got a 1 or a 2. oh well. it's not a big deal. i just feel like an idiot.


i wanted to stab mcauley today. she just makes me want to fucking scream and go on a killing rampage. ugh she's just so bitchy sometimes.


why is school such an anathema to me?!
i guess cause it's school, and it sucks. 

this entry is shit. 



my grandpas memorial mass is this friday. and the SATs the next day. wonderful.

why am i such a cranky bitch?

i couldn't make it to kk's PopPop's wake. and i'm really angry about that. i love you KK.

you have me<3 always.

+mr. fox being super laid back about our articles. he's one cool cat.
+cristina and meg and jojo and kk and maggie and emma 


random.
ireland in 6 days. i'm so fucking exicted.

well i've been studying since about 12. or maybe 11:30? i don't know something like that.  i'm not as overwhelmed as i was earllier.. i just wish i could have calmed down and studied today, rathter than starting tonight. i guess this really wasn't a good idea. well anyway, i got some math problems done and i've mastered the first page of the review ditto (kinda) so i guess it won't be that bad. the spanish midterm is going to be horrible. :/. i made flash cards for pretty much all the vocab, i havn't gone through them yet. i'll probably do some more math and then return to spanish.. argh senora ho bag is a poop. i'm planning on alternating between the two subjects for the entire night.  i dont really think im going to sleep tonight, but maybe a will for a few hours.. but then i don't think i could wake up :/. this is what happens when i procrastinate, which is what i always do. if i studied more, i'd be doing so much better blah. i don't know how my grades are going to be this quarter, i'm predicting better than last..hopefully.. english is easy.. my US grade will be better; however, i don't think i did well on the midterm, so that might ruin my grade :(((((. math will probably be better(once again, depending on my midterm grade). spanish eh i'm really not sure.. i guess the same. french, will be high, but not as high as last quarter..and i must study hard for that midterm.. chem grade will hopefully be better than last quarter..ahh enough analyzing. no one cares anyway. i hardly care anymore. well this weekend should be fun. celebrating the end of midterms with cristina on friday.wee! and hopefully we can get in touch with krista and she can hangout with us too, cause we miss her<3<3.i miss the summer like crazy. i miss the longer days. i hate how its always dark by 5. it's really depressing. hmm i miss the heat. i miss the beach. i miss being tan. i miss being able to loll around the house all day. i miss the freedom. eee just a few more months.. about two more months till ireland! i'll be in dublin the same time as chelsea.
 so hopefully mike and i will be able to meet up with her and have an "international playdate".


more studying. bye

hi there.today i got some work done but i went out too. 
iamprettydrunkrightnow.

dontthinkiamadirtbag. ! 



 i wish i was someone else. i want to be a better person. i feel like i suckat everything i do including being in a relationship. i dont know whats going on with mike
i dont know if my feelings are changing or if its just that ive been upset in general...

 i get scared so easily. ... why am i admitting to this?alcohol makes u honest .. shit man.

mikes upset he feels liek he barely saw me tonight... we hung out but it was a bunch of us.. and we wernt with eachother the whole time.. i talked to melissa alot. 

 i dont kow whats going on with me.i feel better riht now tho.

i have not updated in a while....

i need to vent.. pardon this entry

Junior year sucks.  i am not used to having this much work. i havnt been really applying myself;my grades are not as high as they should be. i feel like a dumbass.. i just don't feel like myself lately.  i havn't been very happy at all.  i have a million things to do for school this weekned which doesn't really help... I am not even going out tonight, i'm staying here in hopes of finishing my apush journals so i don't hvae to worry about them later on.  i just talked to mike, he is pretty upset that he's not seeing me tonight... i'm being a pretty shitty girlfriend.  i'm just trying so hard to focus on school that it's hard to talk to him all the time like i used to....i have not seen much of my friends either... i guess i've just been keeping to myself lately.. 
i really miss my brother... since he is in europe i barely ever talk to him.. and he wont be coming home anytime soon; i have to wait till december.  that is one thing that i am really looking forward to., my trip to europe.

i don't know what else to write.
-katie

havn't updated in awhile..


everything is shit.





why do i always fuck up

<small>
i havn't updated in awhile

this weekend was a lot of fun.  


my parents left friday morning..my brother had a party. it was fun.

meg trinidad bought me a slurpee.. rachel "enhanced" my slurpee ... walked to 7-11 with kathleen and maggie.. talked with lynne

i don't know whats gotten into you. things are reallly falling apart.
if you're going to be that way then don't ask me for any help... pretty
soon you willl realize who your real friends are. i'm sorry that i give a shit about
you. I'm sorry for caring. I'm sorry for not talkign some sense into you in the
first place. I'm sorry i even bothered. 
 

blah.

 
i'm down again.....

i miss being amazingly happy. nothing could fucking touch me, nothing could get me down.
   

 what has happened?

   my moods are inconsistent.  and i hate it. way to many emotions. 



i'm stressed. i need a week of isolation or something. that would be amazing


i really am okay, things are just a little crazy now. pardon this entry.

last night was crazy..


i hung out with brian , his friend steve from mattituck, timmy shea, and his friend ryne from lindenhurst.


beer pong. pool. walking home. 

brian is angry with me. he says he still has feelings... eep

...nothing horrible. im adhd. i hjave lots of energy .they make me take medicine that calms me down and causes insomnia,anxiety,loss of appetite,etc . but thats life. i deal with it

just finished to kill a mockingbird.... good book. i liked it.. i have a test on it tomorrow. Ugh, those test suck they really do. today was okay... school was normal...then i rushed home got ready for track and went to the high school. today was a track workout.. they suck.. it was really cold..and i was tired..but it was actually pretty ok....(alright i am kinda contradicting myself here,hhaha)..i was doing pretty well, i think i suprismed my coach...cause last year i didnt do distant, so he didnt coach me(the other coach did) so he really never seen me run(even if he had he wouldnt have known what i am capable of cause i had my knee injury)..he complimented me and it made me feel good...after he told me that i was doing good i pushed myself even more. i was glad i did because i really want to benefit from this..and the only way i will get anything out of it is if i try.. anyway enough of that. i came home showered and whatnot i started to read mockinbird but i kept on falling asleep so i went down stairs took some meds. and drank some soda.. my mom told me that my grandpa(my moms father-NOT my papa) is in the hospital because he has had kidney failure or something... and i feel horrible.. i really want him to be okay... my mom told me adn then she said.. "I just wanted to tell you because i wouldnt want you to be-- well, if it gets real bad i will have to go down to FLA." ..right when she said that i knew it was pretty bad.. i said i was really sorry and i gave her a big hug..she doesnt need this right now, and neither do i... I really hope he is okay..it feels like i barely know him.. i do but hes just gotten so senial that he has almost forgotten who i am...one time he called and he thought i was my sister,christine, I corrected him and said, "No grandpa it is Katie.".. then he said he had the wrong number and i said no its me granpa, your grandaughter.. and i cant remember what happened next.. im not sure if he hung up or not.. i know he is great.. when i went down to visit him and my grandma (before she got put in a nursing home for her alheimzers)..it was in feb. and he got my mom and i those hearts that are filled with chocolates. it was cute :) i wish i could see him more.. but unfourtanetly they live in florida,and well we live up here.. im hoping for the best.. i hope he pulls through. i love you grandpa,i hope you are okay xoxo since i can say that to him directly i might has well post it on here.... i have to go study for french and spanish and do my math and bio hw..
